shot_metadata.name: SIGRIDS_WINTER_SONG
shot_metadata.title: Sigrid's Winter Song - Voice Anchoring
shot_metadata.narrative_function: Sigrid's voice anchoring reality as others fade
shot_metadata.stitch_from: Shot 19: Sun below horizon, darkness spreading

progressive_state: Voice returns | Prophecy spoken | Camera frost 7% | Song bridging | Watching: The witness speaks

prompt_variants.subject: [SIGRID] standing alone at the feast table, everyone else frozen, her mouth opening to sing 'Krummi svaf í klettagjá,' her young voice clear and pure, breath visible in freezing air, frost forming on her hair.
prompt_variants.action: Sigrid stands slowly while everyone else remains seated, frozen. Faces the darkness where sun disappeared. Opens mouth, begins singing. Her real voice this time - young, female, clear soprano. 'Krummi svaf í klettagjá, kaldri vetrarnóttu á.' Breath forms white clouds with each word. Frost spreads across her wheat-blonde hair, making it white. Behind her, feast transforms - food rotting instantly, tables cracking from cold, tablecloths stiffening with ice. She continues singing, voice stronger: 'verður margt að meini fyrr en dagur fagur rann.' The searchlight flickers, dies. Trawler disappears into darkness. Only Sigrid visible, as if lit from within. Around her, people begin to fade, becoming translucent. Can see through them to frozen ground beneath. She keeps singing, same verse repeating. The three stains on her dress - blood, berry, egg - begin glowing faintly in darkness.
prompt_variants.scene: Feast tables in near-darkness. Stars appearing despite twilight. Frost covering everything. Only Sigrid standing and visible.
prompt_variants.style: Medium shot centered on Sigrid (that's where the camera is), darkness around edges, her face illuminated mysteriously.
prompt_variants.camera_position: Centered on Sigrid during song, that's where the camera is
prompt_variants.dialogue: (Sigrid, clear soprano): 'Krummi svaf í klettagjá, kaldri vetrarnóttu á, verður margt að meini fyrr en dagur fagur rann'
prompt_variants.negative_prompt: no subtitles, show Sigrid lit while others fade, frost spreading, three stains glowing, 1080p

others.voice_purity: Sigrid's true voice replacing male possession
others.community_fading: Others becoming translucent as witness emerges
others.stain_illumination: Three contamination sources glowing in darkness

notes.thematic_purpose: Witness emergence as others fade into memory
notes.connection_to_ending: Sigrid as sole survivor preserving testimony
notes.lullaby_significance: Krummi song providing structure for entire narrative
